title: A Practical Guide to Dragon Riding
description:
Take flight with this sequel to The New York Times best-selling A Practical Guide to Dragons!!How do you hatch a dragon egg? Do dragon riders need reins? How do you say fly in Draconic? Once again, Sindri Suncatcher opens up his notebooks to share with us more wonders of dragonkind. In this fully illustrated guide, readers will learn how to raise a baby dragon, discover step-by-step how to train it, and take flight on the wings of your very own dragon mount.Book Details: 
   Format: Hardcover 
   Publication Date: 8/26/2008 
   Pages: 80 
   Reading Level: Age 6 and Up
author: Lisa Trumbauer
